SI Juega Bioshock infinite :3
The only one of the Bioshock games I really like.

Okay so I am a huge fan of the first 2 Bioshock games, but when this game got announced way back I was turned off by the art style and direction they took this game. I ended up not playing it until now when it went on sale. I still think they should have called it something else, its not really bioshock imo. Its not the underwater world I loved. But its still a really solid and well made shooter with an decent story. 7/10.
剧情很棒吖

是谁杀了我，而我又杀了谁。剧情出色，在独特的美术风格和设定中有极强的代入感。手感还算可以，反正比1代强太多了。天钩的系统也很有趣。这回故事的内核又变成了种族主义和个人抉择，dlc又把1代剧情做了补全。算得上脚本流fps的顶尖了。
但是但是，对晕3D玩家及其不友好，只能视频云通关了QAQ
una gran aventura que se disfruta con una gran historia y acción
es hermoso el juego, lo estoy jugando como por decima vez y no dejo de emocionarme, altamente recomendado y mas si buscas una buena historia, y para que sea mejor juega los otros 2 bioshock
es increible de principio a fin

Jogo muito bom, historia incrível, recomendo muito !

游戏史上最为完美的三部曲之一，从一代到海葬、一个完美的闭环。
以及最令人难忘的伊丽莎白、和那个梦中的巴黎

对不起，安娜，带你去不了巴黎了，what have done is done。
迷人的闭环叙事，名副其实的“无限”。抛开疯狂的捡垃圾等等大量耗费时间的行为和各种诡异的敌人分布让这个游戏过程变的难以接受，但是结局会让你释怀然后删游戏然后不会再打开第二次。
Хорошая игра
不多说，伊丽莎白我老婆
战斗系统和画面有一说一并不出色，毕竟就算是2013年也出现了像最后生还者，孤岛危机3这类游戏，但剧情上的优秀可以掩盖这个作品的所有缺点，光是听游戏内人物的对话就是一种享受，更别提游戏中处处存在的文艺气息，和这文艺下的黑暗腐败，配上美国19世纪独特的独特韵味，说是第九艺术的代表作实在是实至名归，什么时候才能玩到下一款如此用心且优秀的作品呢？
剧情很棒，光是伊丽莎白这个npc就已经值得这个价钱了，剧情耐人寻味 一千个人就有一千个哈姆雷特
jogo muito bom e as dlc um que delicia

10小时通关本体。
平行世界、蒸汽朋克、宗教、资本、政治，巧妙融合的神作级剧情向FPS。

Oyunu 8 saate bitirdim oyun görsel açıdan olsun oynanış açısından olsun güzel tek beğenmediğim kısmı düşmanlar ve bölümlerin aşırı kolay.Oyunda 1 kez öldüm çoğu bölümü can kaybetmeden tamamlayabiliyorsunuz o da Elizabethin sayesinde oyun sırf Elizabeth için bile oynanır bir karakter nasıl bu kadar muhteşem olur sizin için loot yapıyor kilit açmaktan tuttun cephane ve can doldurmanızı sağlıyor çatışma varken saklanıyor ve aşırı tatlı ve gerçekçi tepkiler veriyor ama keşke Elizabethe ayırdıkları zamanı yarısını  düşmanlar ve bosslara ayırsalardı düşmanlar başta dediğim gibi aşırı kolay bosslar rezalet  çatışmalar bir süreden sonra aşırı sıkıyor 
Alınırmı diye sorarsanız alınır ve tatminde eder
А.уительный игорь!Жаль лишь что игру прошел спустя столько лет после выхода.
人无法两次踏入同一条河流，建构在平行世界上的剧情神作！

추천👍 스토리 게임

아직 안 했다면 걱정 없이 구입하면 됩니다 😶
人生最美的相遇 就是遇到伊丽莎白这样的女孩 人生最大的遗憾 就是无法弥补曾经的过错 这就是生化奇兵：无限 一场最美的遗憾
游戏内的场景设计十分惊艳，蒸汽朋克世界很震撼，习惯第一人称技能方面也很有趣，唯一缺点就是容易卡顿死机。好游戏我忍了。
剧情极佳，没有设置多结局有点遗憾，悲剧总是比喜剧更记忆深刻。

This is my favourite Bioshock so far. I understand it is the least favourite of many players, but it only comes to prove that people really like different things and that is alright! To sum up:

+ Elizabeth
+ simply amazing graphics
+ beautifully designed city and landscapes (heaven for screenshots)
+ great gameplay
+ different possibilities for tackling different situations
+ ambitious plot

- lack of choices
- lack of different endings
- main character is a jerk
- different weapons that behave too similarly

So I loved how some characters were convincing. Elizabeth is incredibly likeable, the main villain is quite driven and together with Elizabeth´s protector (the songbird), they make a scary duo. The graphics and landscapes are one of my favourites ever. The game looks beautiful and took me over an hour to progress out of the tutorial, because I couldnt stop appreciating the surroundings.

The gameplay is very smooth, bug-free as far as I could tell, combat is very engaging and satisfying. You can choose how to approach every engagement in your own terms, even using environment to your advantage.

The plot is very interesting and approaches a nowadays problem in gaming: the lack of true choices in videogames. It does this perfectly, but sacrifices itself in the process of making that point. Playing a game like this makes you want to impact on how it ends, which never truly happens. While I understand that this is intentional, to serve as a critic about how all games, regardless of choices, bring the player to the same spot (for example, you make different choices in Witcher games, that lead you to different paths, but they inevitably bring you to Witcher 3 and those choices seem to have been rather meaningless), using this game as a means to express that took away potential for it to be even better. Bioshock games were often criticized, since their endings and behaviour leading to them was over-simplified. I dont think the solution for this would be to take the multiple endings away completely.

The overall lack of choices in the game makes it feel helplessly linear and kills a lot of the joy of playing it. It does not help that your character behaves like a jerk most of the time and that you are forced to see him do things, with which you do not agree. Particularly hateful is how he treats Elizabeth, for example. Every step of the story makes you want to change him and that will never be possible, so it adds more to the frustration of the game.

Lastly, the weapons are different and varied, but for some reason, they dont deliver this difference during gameplay (or I did not notice). I tried circulating them and upgraded different ones for the sake of trying them, but I did not feel like their differences made it worth it. You are basically doing the same thing with a different weapon. I expected them to work differently, to deliver different advantages in particular situations/vs particular enemies and did not feel this.

Overall the game is great and the story is very compeling. The plot is ambitious, but falls victim to itself and the same things it criticizes. If you can overlook the terrible main character and how linear the game is, you will be entertained by the smooth gameplay, by the beautiful surroundings and a very sweet Elizabeth that will accompany you in this adventure.

[h1] 호쾌하고 고어한 FPS 액션을 원하시는 분께 추천 [/h1]

진행하면서 얻을 수 있는 금액에 한계가 있어 자신이 좋아하는 무기 위주로 업글하시길 바랍니다.
(전부 올리지 못합니다.)

처음에는 스토리가 어떻게 흘러가는지 모르시겠지만, 중반부를 넘어가게되면 점점 밝혀집니다.
마지막 엔딩에서는 모든 의문이 풀리게 되며, 약간의 여운을 남깁니다.
干你血妈，这么好玩的游戏为什么要一直死机？
Tanto la historia como la ambientación es una obra de arte. Esperando con ganas que saquen otro título de ésta impresionante saga.
恐怖游戏

Bioshock Infinite is one of the most greatest masterpiece of 2K creations. It's story is a highly representation to what reflection it is in the past-present and future. From racism, slavery, economical failure, violence, religions, sexual orientation, worker industrialist, corrupt business venture and among others that I failed to mention. Gameplay is great and much more challenging than the first-two that I played on Xbox 360.

Problems are technical issue, such as long rendering in some levels and uncertain loading times, that go away for six seconds. It doesn't bother me much, because it's F@#King PC, not console, which many could notice or not, whatever it is to them. Also, main problem is for the game upgrade system which is really a depth of tool to an economic that you have to spend $h!t and realize you only need two of them, regardless.

BioShock Infinite is a fantastic game and it themes of art shows realism in the world we live today will never F@#K!ng change for the rest of your pathetic goddamn lives!

10/10

Replaying this game for the 3rd time, thought I'd give a review. One of the best games I've ever played - definitely the game with the most beautiful level design you will ever see. Hard to believe this came out in 2013 the first time I played it, and now in 2020 it is still one of the best games I have ever played. A must play.

为了伊丽莎白才买的这个游戏。
画质：13年的游戏现在看来还是可以接受，总比渣渣灰清晰的多。
操作：这个键位设定实在是太傻缺了，N是追踪位置，又要按着前进，又要操纵鼠标，再按着N实在是太傻缺了，太难受了用起来，这个操作简直反人类。
剧情：没看懂，游戏背景大概是清朝末年，里面提到了义和团之类的，还有不少辱华的桥段，不适合小孩子玩，这游戏能过审也是很厉害。讲道理越玩越体会到落后就要挨打这个道理，这些桥段看起来还是让我不是很舒服。倒是没看出来这个游戏被称为第九艺术的巅峰的原因，个人不是很喜欢。
老婆：伊丽莎白老婆还是很香的，就是因为伊丽沙白才买的。
运行：第一次下载闪退打不开，后来发现安装目录不能有中文，改了之后才按好的。

После прохождения первых двух частей, возлагал большие надежды на Инфинит, и не ошибся. Игра хороша. Очень хороша. А с полным переводом потрясающая. Меня не особо привлекает в играх графика, геймплей, механики, это для меня второстепенно, важен сюжет. Здесь сюжетом тебя обмазывают с ног до головы, нет ничего лишнего. Остался очень доволен по прохождению игры.
Буду ли перепроходить данную игру, безусловно.
Советую ли к покупке и прохождению, безусловно.
Отличная игра. Спасибо.

即便到了2020年，生化奇兵无限仍然不失为一款优秀的游戏。不论是剧情还是玩法，放到今天依然不落俗套。永远喜欢在沙滩上跳舞的伊丽莎白，布克弹吉他时唱歌的伊丽莎白，战斗时能照顾自己还能提供补给的伊丽莎白
今天碰到个贼难受的bug，后面战斗打到一半巨臂匠跳过来一个击退把我打进了一个带锁的区域，外面那个飞艇处理不掉一直在战斗状态根本开不了锁出不去，靠。

剧情有点难懂，蒸汽朋克加宗教，场景很美，武器有点不符合时代，伊丽莎白很喜欢
13年能做出这样的作品属实很厉害了
